#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

long int a[100005];

int main()
{
	int tc, n, c;

	cin >> tc;

	while(tc--)
	{
		cin >> n >> c;

		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
		{
			a[i] = 0;
		}



		 while(c--)
		 {
		 	int cd, p, q;;
			cin >> cd;

			switch(cd)
			{
			case 0:

				long int v;

				cin >> p >> q >> v;

				for(int i = p-1; i < q; i++)
				{
					a[i] = a[i] + v;
				}

				break;

			case 1:
				//int p, q;

				cin >> p >> q;
				long long int sum = 0;

				for(int i = p-1; i < q; i++)
				{
					sum = sum + a[i];
				}

				cout << sum << endl;

				break;
			}
		 }
	}

}
